title: Hardware Troubleshooting
description: Curated fixes and guidance for common hardware issues based on human testimonials, posts, reviews, and video captions.

fields.entity: An object describing the device or component experiencing the issue.
fields.issue: Short summary of the hardware problem.
fields.severity: Severity rating from 0 to 10 indicating how serious the issue is.
fields.confidence: Confidence level (0â€“1) that the issue and proposed fixes are accurate.
fields.references: List of URLs or citations where the issue and fixes are discussed.
fields.proposed_fixes: List of proposed fixes or steps to resolve the issue.
fields.first_seen: Date when the issue was first observed.
fields.last_confirmed: Date when the issue was last confirmed.
fields.actionability: Object containing urgency and cost estimate to address the issue.
